title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H1 – Apr 7 2022
itunes:title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H1 – Apr 7 2022
description:
Clay says for many Americans it's the official start of spring with the return of Major League Baseball and the Masters. Arrogant journo Anne Applebaum of The Atlantic dismisses Hunter Biden story: "I don't find it interesting." Credit to Daniel Schmidt, freshman at the University of Chicago, for asking Applebaum the excellent question she dismissed. We need a special counsel to probe the Biden Crime Family. Psaki denies Joe and Jill Biden were office mates with Hunter. Pelosi and most of Washington has covid. Still, Buck reminds: "Unlike psychotic leftists who, when Clay and I get sick, tell us that they want bad things to happen to us, we wish good health to all of our fellow Americans and fellow human beings regardless of their politics." Fauci pins covid deaths on Trump.

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
